snippet: The interim chief executive, John J. Mulligan, said “bringing firearms to Target creates an environment that is at odds with the family-friendly shopping and work experience we strive to create.”
abstract: Target is asking its customers to not bring firearms into its stores, even where it is allowed by law.
lead_paragraph: The interim chief executive, John J. Mulligan, said “bringing firearms to Target creates an environment that is at odds with the family-friendly shopping and work experience we strive to create.”

headline.main: Target Asks Its Customers to Please Leave Guns Outside
headline.print_headline: Target Asks Its Customers to Please Leave Guns Outside
